page.title: 07CRYSTAL SPRINGS FARM
page.content: Cuscus Lane Mercaston.Farm is built on gravel mound.Uses spring water. Harnessed spring & piped to farm. Andrew Adams & Wife moved in 1968. Wife teaches at Brackendale Infant School,Mackworth. Married daughter 25 & husband at present living on farm. Son 21 in college in Australia on Young Farmer's Club Scholarship-North cott Trust-3yr course. Conservation minded. Hedges mechanically trimmed but 300m cut & layered each year. The land is divided into small fields - hedges & fences retained.Grassland fertilised with farmyard manure.90% grass cut is made into silage & stored as big bag silage-no additives- or in a ppitt. Few acres grown for cattle food.
